name: Riptire: The Reckoning
description:
You land in a dark world surrounded by a starry night sky and low-poly buildings, with roads that lead to nowhere. Limbo, the word floats around in your head. What is this strange land? Why are you a car? Why do you move so poorly? Why did a car wake up in a graveyard? Play and find out! Or not. Limbo is like that sometimes.

Use WASD to move around. Get quests from other prisoners of this starry limbo, and collect the green flag to progress to the next level. Get those flags!
